issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Per doc review comments on PR 1372. (https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/1372)

It doesn't look like we have loading, error, or complete events for mapviews in android.
fields.summary: Android: Map View doesn't generate loading, error, or complete events

comments.body: Closing ticket as the issue will not fix.
